mapper.insert: insert into CHATTING (CHAT_NO, STUDY_CODE, STU_ID, CHAT_CONT, CHAT_DATE) values (SEQ_CHATTING.nextval, #{studyCode}, #{stuId}, #{chatCont}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select c.CHAT_NO, c.STU_ID, c.CHAT_CONT, c.CHAT_DATE, c.STUDY_CODE, s.STU_NAME_KO from CHATTING c join STUDENT s on c.STU_ID = s.STU_ID where c.STUDY_CODE = #{studyCode} order by c.CHAT_DATE asc

SELECT a.*, COUNT(sm.STU_ID) AS member_count, row_number() over (order by a.study_date desc) rnum FROM ( SELECT s.study_code, study_title, study_date, sm.STU_ID, sm.SM_LEADER FROM study s LEFT OUTER JOIN study_member sm ON s.study_code = sm.study_code WHERE sm.STU_ID =#{userId} AND sm.STUDY_STATUS = 'Y' ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN study_member sm ON a.study_code = sm.study_code GROUP BY a.study_code, a.study_title, a.study_date, a.STU_ID, a.SM_LEADER
SELECT s.STU_NAME_KO, s.STU_NAME_EN FROM student s JOIN study_member sm ON s.STU_ID = sm.STU_ID WHERE sm.STUDY_CODE = #{studyCode} AND sm.STUDY_STATUS = 'Y'
